[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Employer of Record” module_class=”page-hero-template” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ title_font=”|700||on|||||” title_text_align=”center” title_text_color=”#29295b” title_font_size=”40px” title_letter_spacing=”2px” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_text_color=”#777e84″ subhead_font_size=”15px” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(255,255,255,0.4)” background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/hospital.jpeg” custom_padding=”165px||165px||true|false” title_font_size_tablet=”” title_font_size_phone=”30px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end=”#e9f2f7″ background_color_gradient_direction=”270deg” background_color_gradient_start_position=”65%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”0%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_color_gradient_start_phone=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end_phone=”#ffffff”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”70px||70px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/lab-tubes.jpeg” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”44px||||false|false”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_font_size=”26px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||4px||false|false”]

Staffing and Recruiting Life Sciences

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]As a part of providing full contingent workforce staffing services for life sciences, biotech and pharmaceutical companies, we can also act as employer of record. Whether you are looking to expand your contract staff, reduce your hiring costs or integrate a combination of strategies, ClinLab can deliver the perfect solution.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#e9edee” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_font_size=”26px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||4px||false|false”]

Employer of Record

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]Place existing employees or new hires on our payroll. As their Employer of Record, we assume responsibility for the entire payroll process – including paying employees, and withholding and reporting taxes – to save you time, reduce administrative costs and manage risks.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_color=”#e9edee” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”53px||24px||false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”26px” text_orientation=”center”]

Let’s get started!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_color=”#e9edee” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_module=”3086″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_orientation=”center”]Please fill out this form and we will get in touch with you shortly.

(*) Are required[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
Staffing and Recruiting Life Sciences As a part of providing full contingent workforce staffing services for life sciences, biotech and pharmaceutical companies, we can also act as employer of record. Whether you are looking to expand your contract staff, reduce your hiring costs or integrate a combination of strategies, ClinLab can deliver the perfect solution.   Employer of Record Place existing employees or new hires on our payroll. As their Employer of Record, we assume responsibility for the entire payroll process – including paying employees, and withholding and reporting taxes – to save you time, reduce administrative costs and manage risks.  

Get Started!

[gravityform id="1" name="Contact Us" title="false" description="false"]
